front.title: The ANTACID Replication Service: Protocol and Algorithms

abstract.t: This memo specifies the protocol and algorithms of the ANTACIDReplication Service, designed to replicate hierarchically namedrepositories of XML documents for business-critical, internetworkedapplications.ASCII and HTML versions of this document are available athttp://www.codeontheroad.com/papers/draft-schwartz-antacid-protocol.txt and http://www.codeontheroad.com/papers/draft-schwartz-antacid-protocol.html, respectively.
